Video description: After a couple months of fighting schedules Ethan, Ryan and myself were able to sit down and chat about the work they're doing on Gathers.us and the ChicagoDB. This video is actually the second as we had a technical difficulty with the first recording. I really appreciate that we were able to finally get this interview recorded! Oh, and they did end up getting some chicken.
